dict.acceptation: 物质，材料；实质，内容；[神]灵；（织品的）质地；

sent.orig: Above this restriction threshold the substance is restricted and declaration of the substance is obliged.
sent.trans: 超过这一限制门槛的，实质是对于限制和宣言的实质都是责任。

sent.orig: Reference substance is a chemical substance that is usually used in chemical analysis.
sent.trans: 对照品是化学分析中常用的物质。

sent.orig: A fluid substance is any substance which flows.
A substance donates protons to some other substance.
sent.trans: 一物质向其他物质提供质子。

sent.orig: Repeated use of a substance can also lead to physical addiction or substance dependence.
sent.trans: 反复使用一种物质可以导致成瘾或对该物质的依赖。
